title: Font Retailers
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Font Retailers**

Font Retailers sell fonts from several, and in some cases, many different [foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/foundries). Many foundries also sell their own fonts directly and sometimes in addition to selling through a retailer.

Many of today's font retailers also carry their own font collection, such as [Veer's](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer) Umbrella Collection, FontShop's [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont) foundry and Phil's Fonts with [Garage Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Garage%20Fonts). In other scenarios there are large foundries that have spun off a retail arm, such as [Bitstream's](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream) [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MyFonts) and [Monotype's](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype) [Fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fonts.com).
